text: puokke( puok mou sh ri ki n) ban niyeay tha a l laoh mean botr . trong mha saatasam . trong chea anak mean cheatibamphot . avei now leumekh cheachraen chean ning avei now leu phendei chea kammosetthi robsa trong . puok anak kmean phosdo tang namuoy banhcheak pi rueng nih( kar mean botr) laey . tae puok anak niyeay champoh a l laoh nouv avei del puok anak mindoeng ryy
